| HistoryText             = Hammer Battle Group was a group of men in armor serving the [[Hammer Industries (Earth-616)|Hammer Industries]] under the command of [[Sasha Hammer (Earth-616)|Sasha Hammer]]. The Group traveled to [[Paris (France)|Paris]] during the Fear Itself crisis to retrieve the [[Detroit Steel Armor]] and the body of [[Doug Johnson III (Earth-616)|Lt. Johnson]] and there they collided with the [[Paul Duval (Earth-616)|Gray Gargoyle]] possessed by [[Mokk (Earth-616)|Mokk]].{{r|Invincible Iron Man Vol 1 506}}
